thread.title: Everyone is making the same Gabriel Jesus jokes on Twitter after wonderkid's late winner for Man City vs Swansea
thread.title_full: Everyone is making the same Gabriel Jesus jokes on Twitter after wonderkid's late winner for Man City vs Swansea

author: Jim Daly
title: Everyone is making the same Gabriel Jesus jokes on Twitter after wonderkid's late winner for Man City vs Swansea
text:
Sport Everyone is making the same Gabriel Jesus jokes on Twitter after wonderkid's late winner for Man City vs Swansea The teenager got both goals against the Swans, including a 90th minute winner, and Twitter did its thing... Share Jesus saves...(sorry) (Photo: Getty Images Europe) Share Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
The 19-year-old Â£27m Brazilian scored a winner in the 92nd minute after Gylfi Sigurdsson had dragged the Swans level with 10 minutes to go. 
The win took City into third above Arsenal and in check with Chelsea at the top just about, leaving Pep Guardiola's men 10 points off top spot. 
And as Jesus knocked in the winner in injury time, the watching world took to Twitter to all pretty much make the same joke. It was obvious what was going to happen... And it did... Obviously there were lots of cross jokes One guy even combined the two for the ultimate hack tweet OR just try and get as many Jesus puns in as possible We're assuming this one is about the Man City striker... Mainly City fans were just tanking their lucky stars...(and jesus) 'What a wow'
